# 5.0 Docs

## Code analysis

- [CA1416 warning](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/code-analysis/5.0/ca1416-platform-compatibility-analyzer.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 5 caused by the enablement of code analysis rule CA1416.
- [CA1417 warning](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/code-analysis/5.0/ca1417-outattributes-on-pinvoke-string-parameters.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 5 caused by the enablement of code analysis rule CA1417.
- [CA1831 warning](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/code-analysis/5.0/ca1831-range-based-indexer-on-string.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 5 caused by the enablement of code analysis rule CA1831.
- [CA2013 warning](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/code-analysis/5.0/ca2013-referenceequals-on-value-types.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 5 caused by the enablement of code analysis rule CA2013.
- [CA2014 warning](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/code-analysis/5.0/ca2014-stackalloc-in-loops.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 5 caused by the enablement of code analysis rule CA2014.
- [CA2015 warning](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/code-analysis/5.0/ca2015-finalizers-for-memorymanager-types.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 5 caused by the enablement of code analysis rule CA2015.
- [CA2200 warning](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/code-analysis/5.0/ca2200-rethrow-to-preserve-stack-details.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 5 caused by the enablement of code analysis rule CA2200.
- [CA2247 warning](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/code-analysis/5.0/ca2247-ctor-arg-should-be-taskcreationoptions.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 5 caused by the enablement of code analysis rule CA2247.
